entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
